Fanatic Charge.name: Fanatic Charge
Fanatic Charge.flavor: You remind an ally of his or her purpose and fill this ally with a fanatic’s zeal.
keywords:
Close burst 5

Target: One ally in the burst who can see you

Effect: The target makes a charge attack as a free action against an enemy you choose. On a hit, the target deals +1[W] damage.
Fanatic Charge.target: One ally in the burst who can see you
Fanatic Charge.effect: The target makes a charge attack as a free action against an enemy you choose. On a hit, the target deals +1[W] damage.

Sudden Conversion.name: Sudden Conversion
Sudden Conversion.flavor: Your words strike a chord with the enemy and bring it to your side for a few moments.
Sudden Conversion.target: One enemy that can see and hear you
Sudden Conversion.onHit: The target is dominated (save ends). The target has a −2 penalty to saving throws against this effect.
Sudden Conversion.onMiss: The target is dazed and weakened (save ends both).

Imperiled Leader.name: Imperiled Leader
Imperiled Leader.flavor: You have nothing to fear, even when the enemy closes in for the kill.
Imperiled Leader.trigger: An adjacent enemy targets you with a melee attack
Imperiled Leader.target: One ally in the burst who can see you
Imperiled Leader.effect: The ally shifts 4 squares to a square adjacent to you. The triggering attack targets the ally instead of you. If the enemy’s attack hits, you regain the use of fanatic charge.
